results.title: Simvastatin Enhances the Immune Response Against Mycobacterium tuberculosis
results.text_hl: These results demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ activates several immune mechanisms that favor the containment of @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014376 @@@M. tuberculosis infection@@@, providing relevant evidence to consider statins as candidates for host-directed therapy.
